characters.tanaka: Tanaka: (Arrogant Japanese man in his late 20s). (Dark navy business suit, loose tie). (Short messy brown hair). (Sneering, arrogant smirk). Dynamic 2D anime style. Visual representation of a reckless gambler.
characters.zouzei_man: Zouzei-man (Tax Monster): (Massive, hulking 2D monster). Body appears to be composed of (shredded tax documents, coins, and official-looking papers). (Glowing sinister purple eyes). (Dark shadowy aura). Personification of heavy taxation and social insurance fees.
characters.bukkadaka_man: Bukkadaka-man (Inflation Monster): (Large, bloated, spherical 2D monster). Covered in (bright red price tags with high numbers). (Gaping maw with rows of sharp teeth). (Fiery red aura). Personification of rising prices and currency devaluation.
characters.money_tree: Money Tree: (Radiant golden sapling or tree). (Golden leaves made of pure light). (Surrounded by a warm, peaceful golden aura). Visual representation of compounding assets.
characters.noise: Noise (The Mist): (Ominous black and purple miasma). (Ghostly, formless faces whispering in the mist). (Swirling shadowy tendrils) that try to blind the characters. Personification of market panic and media sensationalism.
